body.name: Graco Contender Slim Convertible Car Seat, West Point
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 32 mins
features: Convertible car seat grows with your child from rear-facing harness (5-40 lb) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lb)
Slim car seat design saves space in your back seat
Compact and lightweight to easily transfer from car to car
Travel car seat is certified for aircraft use to help keep your child safe while flying
Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps to protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes
body.description: The Graco® Contender™ Slim Convertible Car Seat features 2 modes of use to grow with your child from rear-facing harness (5-40 lb) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lb), with a slim car seat design that helps save space in your back seat. This is the perfect travel car seat as its lightweight design easily transfers from car to car, and it is certified for aircraft use to help keep your child safe while flying. It easily grows with your child with the Simply Safe Adjust™ harness system, which allows the headrest and harness to adjust together in one motion. The included LATCH and easy-to-read level indicator help make installation easier. This car seat conveniently features a removable, dishwasher-safe cup holder, a machine-washable seat pad, and 2 recline positions for ease of use. The car seat is Graco® ProtectPlus Engineered™ to help protect in frontal, side, rear, and rollover crashes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Highlights you will love: The slim car seat design saves space in your back seatIt's your go-to lightweight and compact travel car seatThe removable, dishwasher-safe cup holder can be used on either side of the seat Graco Contender Slim Convertible Car Seat The Graco Contender Slim Convertible Car Seat grows with your child from rear-facing harness (5-40 lb) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lb). The slim, lightweight design saves space in your back seat and this compact car seat is certified for aircraft use, so you’re always travel-ready. With the Simply Safe Adjust harness system, the headrest and harness adjust together in one motion, while the included LATCH and easy-to-read level indicator help make installation easier.

Ease of Use 2-in-1 Convertible Car Seat 1) Rear-Facing Harness 5-40 lb 2) Forward-Facing Harness 22-65 lb ProtectPlus Engineered This combination of the most rigorous crash tests helps to protect your child in frontal, side, rear, and rollover crashes. No-Rethread Simply Safe Adjust Harness Adjust the height of the 8-position headrest and harness in one motion with the Simply Safe Adjust Harness System, ensuring your child is always properly secured. Easier Installation Open belt paths allow for easier installation access and easy-to-read level indicator helps eliminate installation guesswork.

More to Love Slim, Space-Saving Design A slim car seat design helps you save space in your back seat. Lightweight & Travel-Ready This compact and lightweight car seat easily transfers from car to car and is certified for aircraft use. LATCH-Equipped LATCH-equipped to help make installation easier. Dishwasher-Safe Cup Holder Removable cup holder can be used on either side of the car seat to make more room for passengers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Assembled, Lightweight, and Affordable!
reviews.reviewText: By far the most comfortable, lightweight, and stylish carseat I've ever gotten for my toddler. It's very padded and adjustable with multiple pads for different heights and comfortability. Perfect for sleeping too, I'm never worried about my toddler's head falling forwaed onto his chest causing difficulty breathing like other carseats have allowed. The carseat also extends too for taller kids who take after the string bean dads just like my son does!All padding is easily removable. The chest harness comes with 2 covers so your baby doesn't get a belt rash on their neck, and it even comes with gripping on the underside so that it holds onto your childs clothing and doesn't slide down only to be constantly readjusted.The harness strapping difficulty level I'd rate at a 2/5, the chest harness my toddler is able to buckle himself, and has an easily accessible button on the top to disconnect (not easy for kids though). The groin/thigh buckle however is a bit tougher- if you have weakness in your hands, or particularly in your thumbs you may need to use two hands, I can manage with just 1 hand with a strong and firm press in order to disconnect, although it gets to me some days especially when I'm sick.The carseat also comes with an attachable drink holder that is easy to clean that doesn't have drain holes (great for kids who like to pour our their drinks, my back seats where saved from cranberry juice because it didn't drain thankfully) and it can be easily attached to either side of the carseat.Installing it was a breeze especially since it came assembled! It also wasn't bulky which is a plus. I'd 1000% recommend this carseat and will be getting it again for my next children.If you're ever worried about which brand to buy and how much to spend on quality, this is your sign to buy it! Cost effective and reliable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great transition for infant
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new car seat for my first baby who was outgrowing his first. I also wanted something that he could grown with so I wasn’t purchasing another one again in a year AND that I could travel with. I’ve taken this on two flights and on two vacations where it was used in a rental car and it is amazing. Fits great on a plane; yes I used it in an actual airplane seat. My child is a madman and I just knew he needed to be in a carseat. This was great. He is comfortable in it and I love how slim it is. Great price as well. He’ll be able to fit in this since it extends for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was thought because our dog chewed up the strap to our old infant style car seat. My wife loves this. It isn’t too heavy, and is easy to install and un-install. This would work from infant up to toddlers. Our baby is almost a year and she really seems to enjoy sitting up higher than the infant seats doing cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Latch is impossible. Otherwise great.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this before an international trip since my son recently outgrew his Doona. I first tried using the latch setup rear facing and it was impossible to tighten. I gave up. And I’ve installed at least 4 or 5 other types of car seats before. Once we switched to the seat belt it was better. I do wish there was something on the sides to hold the straps between use. Every time I sit my son down I have to dig them out from under him. Otherwise it was a great seat, not too heavy to lug around the airport, and made it safe and sound both ways gate checked in a bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Car Seat
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Alittle harder for me to remove. But great, safe and comfy for my granddaughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, easy setup
reviews.reviewText: This car seat fit perfectly in our suv. It was fast and easy to setup. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic choice for a carseat to save space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have enjoyed this carseat! It is slim, doesn’t take up too much room. Easy to adjust straps and install into my vehicle. It seems pretty comfortable to him lol. Graco has a great reputation when it comes to baby essentials but this one is top 2! would buy again
